item.description:
Dance to the music by the 18-piece Beantown Swing Orchestra as they return to the swing dance scene with some exciting new music! Vocalist Dana Lauren will sing classic Sinatra big band arrrangements, transcribed and rescored specially for female vocals. These include "The Way You Look Tonight" and "I Could Have Danced All Night." (You can also catch Dana the following week at Scullers singing with Arturo Sandoval!)

The band plays from 9pm to midnight, and there will be a beginner swing dance lesson at 8:00pm. No partner is required. The lesson is a great opportunity for meetup members to meet each other (or at least the meetup members of the opposite sex) because the "followers" rotate through the "leaders" continuously throughout the hour-long lesson. You will get to know dozens of people before the dance even starts!

This dance is hosted by Boston Swing Central.
item.how_to_find_us: Frank will be on stage conducting the band. Can one of the meetup members please volunteer to lead the group?

group.name: The Boston-Area Swing/Blues Dance Meetup Group

item.name: Swing Dance at Springstep in Medford
